name: Piercing the 4th Dimension
description:
Controls:

Directional Keys / Joystick :  move player character / switch between menu options
Space bar / 'Fire' button: select menu option
'Q' key: return to main menu / quit
'G' key: enable/disable invincibility (use this if you are having trouble with a section and would like to move on to the next one)

Will you survive a trip through the 4th dimension? Fall through a seemingly infinite series of holes while dodging many obstacles.

If you lose all your health, you will restart from the most recent checkpoint. Use the level select menu to get back to where you were in case of a game crash or other interruption.

This is an entry for Wizard Jam 10. It was made over a period of two weeks.
